comments.author: Andrius_11G
comments.body: 5 mil pre-mine. No thank you  Again, no fair distribucion, centralized coin.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Without a whitepaper/use cases/roadmap it's really hard be focused on such project With such percentage of premine  there is an high risk of big dump on the market or liquidation by several parties.How did you plan to provide this coin to charity? It will be also liquidated on some exchange?Suggestion: remove $ from total number of coins emitted ($51,670,651.84) since you're not minting USD dollar

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: Quote from: bitbollo on October 14, 2022, 09:08:12 PMWithout a whitepaper/use cases/roadmap it's really hard be focused on such project With such percentage of premine  there is an high risk of big dump on the market or liquidation by several parties.How did you plan to provide this coin to charity? It will be also liquidated on some exchange?Suggestion: remove $ from total number of coins emitted ($51,670,651.84) since you're not minting USD dollar My impression is that this will just be another alt that will be short-lived in the market.We have seen serious projects that attain long lifespan in this industry. And with this coin, I don't think they can even survive for couple of years in the trading market.Though it is too early to judge, but if you have seen a lot of projects already, I don't think this one will find its valuable application in this market. They need to address certain problem to keep afloat in this market. Otherwise, this can easily be abandoned without warning.

comments.author: ImExory
comments.body: Payouts from pool seems not to work.Pool says its been already payed out something.i double checked address is fine.Pool doesnt show a TX just say 55mins ago, cant find any transaction in block explorer. "same for the second payout"Hope to get payed soon.

comments.author: keymakercoin
comments.body: In response to the questions/concerns1. The pool had a delay in issuing payments and the issue is now fixed.   2.  About the virus issue, we uploaded the zip file to VirusTotal which only detected a CoinMiner. (https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/b27b8520de86468e1cb74223508fabff1a81121de13fffbcbe4840c28b0d03f2/detection), We removed the zip files and placed the binary files for release and will no longer use zip.3. To find the nodes you can visit this link https://explorer.keymaker.cc/network

comments.author: azrelix
comments.created_time: November 02, 2022, 04:57:42 AMLast edit: November 02, 2022, 06:08:28 AM by azrelix
comments.body: How come the pre-mine wallet is running POS? with over 6 million coins, us little folk will have no chance to get any rewards via POSCurrently the pre-mine address is also the main pool address, and is also running POS.. the pre-mine address has 99.77% of current coins in circulation.If my calculations are correct, if no new coins are generated it would take approx 1 1/2 days for anyone other than the pre-mine address to find a POS block. (if you assume its 50% POS / 50% POW)

comments.author: azrelix
comments.body: Also in regards to POS, I thought POS was only due to get 1.1 coins per block.how come the rewards are increasing and then resetting to 1.1POS block with a reward of 28.6 (to the pre-mine address)https://explorer.keymaker.cc/tx/d46e033aa0718b9009c3250de61dcac69e977b1601028d19aa259bc3ca7a469dthe next POS block was 1.1.and they are slowly building up and now back to 11 coinshttps://explorer.keymaker.cc/tx/c3a996e73a7e808c2e45d7d258fee628bede026ef1f31d98c8fea72d37e0a606
